text: Two storey branch of Mr DIY. Very convenient for the residents of East Ledang and the surrounding areas. Parking is easy and plentiful. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

Opened fairly recently, one and only MR DIY at Medini, as of Aug 2024. The store is rather small if compared with other outlets but it does the job well. Top notch customer service from the staff here. Will visit again.

Not happy with the staffs. Im a hotwheels buyer. She said to me ‚Äúdont bother looking bang, if have new surely i will buy it myself‚Äù. The fair customers experience from this outlet just thrown down the drain. Might as well mrdiy dont sell it to customers. Sell internally for themselves.
Easy parking, shop has everything you need
